**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 78 **Archetype** [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) **Prerequisites** [Alkenstar Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3568) --- Your unpredictable gunfire often catches enemies off guard or hits unprotected areas. Make a ranged Strike with a firearm against a creature that you haven't already attacked on this turn. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage on this Strike equal to the number of weapon damage dice. The Strike gains the following failure effect. **Failure** The firearm misfires, but it doesn't cause the other critical failure effects listed below.
**Critical Failure** The firearm misfires and also explodes. It becomes [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2), and it deals its normal weapon damage to all creatures in a 20-foot burst centered on the firearm, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your class DC. This damage includes any from the weapon's [fundamental](/equipment/runes/fundamental-weapon-runes) and [property](/equipment/runes/weapon-property-runes) runes.
